'''''Mallorn'' 6''' is the sixth issue of the Tolkien Society's journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in [[1972]].

==Contents==

* '''Editorial'''
** Thoughts of Inanity, A Sort of Editorial
*** By Jon M. Harvey
** Hobbit Mail (letters to the editor)
*** By Dave Weldrake, Sam Long, Archie Mercer, Tony Fallone
* '''Notes'''
** Wanderer of the Wilderness
*** By Mike Cruden
** The Races of Middle-Earth
*** By Archie Mercer
** The Huntsmen of Fiction
*** By Jon M. Harvey
** Belladonna Goes to a Party
*** By Belladonna Took ([[Vera Chapman]])
* '''Creative'''
** I Wish (poem)
*** By Lisa Conesa
** Ghost in the Sun (poem)
*** By A.R. Fallone
** Desolation (poem)
*** By Lisa Conesa
** On Leaving the Main Sequence (poem)
*** By A.R. Fallone
* '''Reviews'''
** ''Voyage to Arcturus'' by David Lindsay
*** Reviewed by A.R. Fallone
